description: ENGLEWOOD, Colo. (AP) _ WideOpenWest Inc. (WOW) on Friday reported second-quarter net income of $4 million. The Englewood, Colorado-based company said it had profit of 5 cents per share. The results did not meet Wall Street expectations.
title: WideOpenWest: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
title_page: WideOpenWest: Q2 Earnings Snapshot | AP News
maintext:
ENGLEWOOD, Colo. (AP) _ WideOpenWest Inc. (WOW) on Friday reported second-quarter net income of $4 million.
The Englewood, Colorado-based company said it had profit of 5 cents per share.
The results did not meet Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 7 cents per share.
The cable TV company posted revenue of $176.1 million in the period, also falling short of Street forecasts. Four analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $177.2 million.
For the current quarter ending in October, WideOpenWest said it expects revenue in the range of $171 million to $175 million.
The company expects full-year revenue in the range of $704 million to $708 million.
_____
This story was generated by Automated Insights (http://automatedinsights.com/ap) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on WOW at https://www.zacks.com/ap/WOW
